1481430.name: No Sushi, No Life
1481430.description:
You’ve arrived at a robot sushi bar with one goal in mind… To eat all the sushi you can.
Grab all the sushi coming your way and stuff them in your mouth!
Test your reflexes as more and more plates of sushi rush toward you!
Eat ‘til you drop in VR with “No Sushi, No Life”!

Features:
・Use your hands to pick up and eat sushi off a moving conveyor belt.
・If a plate of sushi falls off the conveyor belt, it’s game over.
・As you continue to eat sushi, the conveyor belt speed will become faster, and more and more sushi will appear.
・See how long you can survive amidst an onslaught of sushi!

*This game is VR-only.

Now Supporting DMM VR Connect!
Upload your custom VRM avatar to DMM VR Connect to play “No Sushi, No Life” as your avatar!
